text: @realDonaldTrump So let me guess ...... the Tulsa Rally was a flop filling only one third of the stadium & you’ve lost whatever credibility you had left after your woeful handling of the coronavirus pandemic? So now it’s woe is me cause the Election is rigged again time .... #TrumpIsAFraud #POTUS https://t.co/koSt6ncHLZ
